title: The Artist's Studio 1
description:
What’s in store to explore? Studio art-making, visits by a guest artist, or a gallery activity station? Where will the Artist’s Studio pop up next? Visit the Family Room on the day of your visit to discover what’s planned.

For more information about family programs, please call (312) 857-7161 or e-mail familyprograms@artic.edu. For upcoming family programs, please visit the family programs calendar.

This program is designed for families with children. This program cannot accept groups. To learn about group offerings, please call (312) 443-9362.
